response.answer_text: As a matter of fact, many of the services of a smartwatch requires an internet connection. (eg. time adjustment texting ) though it is possible for it to function without internet, it is still possible. Also, an internet connection is not necessarily wifi. It could be through a phone via bluetooth or through mobile data(SIM card). So the answer depends on the brand/model and which functions you want.
Most of the time smartwatches do not need internet connection. It Works through mobile's Bluetooth. But, there are some functions in smartwatches that may need Internet connection.
